QuestData.Title: Intelligence Gathering
QuestData.Description: I need to know what the Scarlet Onslaught is planning today. You will be my instrument in this task.$B$BFly to Onslaught Harbor and rifle through their baggage trunks for documents. The trunks will be locked, so you'll have to take the keys from the Scarlet Onslaught members by whatever means.
QuestData.LogDescription: Aurochs Grimbane at Death's Rise wants you to collect 5 Onslaught Intel Documents.
QuestData.RewardText: Hand them over. I will sift through the useless ones and if there's anything actionable, I will call upon you.$b$bEither way, return tomorrow. It is well known that they change their plans on a daily basis.
